text: Quite disappointed with this laptop, the Dell Inspiron 5000 Flagship Premium 15.6" FHD Gaming Laptop | Intel Core i5-7300HQ Quad-Core | NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 with 4GB GDDR5 | 16GB RAM | 1TB HDD | Backlit Keyboard | Windows 10 Home. It overheats frequently when playing Apex Legends, and the performance throttles significantly. The port selection has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.

Had several issues with the Dell Inspiron 5000 Flagship Premium 15.6" FHD Gaming Laptop | Intel Core i5-7300HQ Quad-Core | NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 with 4GB GDDR5 | 16GB RAM | 1TB HDD | Backlit Keyboard | Windows 10 Home since day one. Wi-Fi drops intermittently and the build material feels cheap. Performance in gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

Quite disappointed with this laptop, the Dell Inspiron 5000 Flagship Premium 15.6" FHD Gaming Laptop | Intel Core i5-7300HQ Quad-Core | NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 with 4GB GDDR5 | 16GB RAM | 1TB HDD | Backlit Keyboard | Windows 10 Home. It overheats frequently when playing Fortnite, and the performance throttles significantly. The port selection has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.

Wi-Fi drops intermittently and the battery life feels cheap. Performance in competitive gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.
